sections.Background: In her first appearance, under the name "Ikenami", she asked Kogoro to help find a man named Shiro Shibata, so she could retrieve an old photograph. Conan realized that Ikenami is lying to Kogoro when she introduces herself for unknown reasons. At first, Conan suspected her to be a member from the Black Organization despite her lies, and maybe her fake identity. At the end of case it is revealed that she is Heiji Hattori's mother.
sections.Personality: Not much is known about this woman owing to her rare appearance. She is calm, elegant, and has incredible kendo skills. She can catch the katana of a person swinging it wildly with just her fan. She was shown her calm personality, even when Kogoro Mouri and Ran panicked. She's also very brave. In a movie, Heiji stated that he inherited his bravery from his mother.
sections.Old Photograph Murder Case (Manga: 276-2: Concerned with Heiji's choice of detective friends, she decided to test Kogoro's skills. She contacted an old acquaintance from school and together they hatched a plan to see if Kogoro could track him down to retrieve an old photograph. She turned up at the Mouri agency using her maiden name and pose as a client who wants to get the photo back as it was the only memory of a competition.
sections.Crimson Love Letter (Movie: 21): Shizuka helps Kazuha win her deal with Heiji about his future husband against Momiji and learns to play Karuta with talent by Shizuka's help. She teaches her thoroughly until the day of the championship.
sections.Heizo Hattori: Heizo is her husband. While she cares a lot for him, she doesn't approve of him using Heiji as bait in episode 263. She is not intimidated by Heizo's fierce personality, and he seems to listen to her. She is of the few persons who can stand up to the sneaky and stubborn Heizo.
sections.Heiji Hattori: Heiji is her son. She is strict with him and concerns a lot of his welfare.
sections.Kazuha Toyama: Shizuka gets on well with Heiji's childhood friend, and would talk a lot on the phone.
sections.Name origin: Shizuka Hattori's maiden name Shizuka Ikenami comes from mystery author Shōtarō Ikenami, who shares the same surname. His character Heizo Hasegawa has also given his name to Shizuka's husband, Heizo Hattori.
sections.Trivia: - Shizuka is kind of a Mystery Magnet her friends and acquaintances keep getting involved in murder cases, and most of the time Heiji would be sent beforehand to visit them, only for him to find himself in a case.[1] Conan was in all of them, and Shizuka was introduced in a case where one of her friend's was murdered (the one case that didn't involve Heiji, although he still appeared in the end to pick her up).
